question: Which committee on Panchayati Raj in India takes of three phases : “The phase of ascendancy, The phase of stagnation and The phase of decline”?
explanation: Asoka Mehta Committee on Panchayati Raj in India takes of three phases : “The phase of ascendancy, the phase of stagnation and the phase of decline”. In December 1977, the Janata Government appointed this committee. It submitted its report in August 1978 and made 132 recommendations to revive and strengthen the declining Panchayati Raj system in the country.
